title: Samsung's Gear S2 smartwatch arrives in the UK on November 12th
text:
Samsung's Gear S2 smartwatch arrives in the UK on November 12th 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
The Gear S2 is one of Samsung's best smartwatches to date, combining a sleek design and a unique rotating bezel for navigation. The Tizen ti...
